headline: Leidos (LDOS) Expands Defense Role with New DISA Contract
summary: Leidos Holdings, Inc. (NYSE:LDOS) is one of the 10 cheap Jim Cramer stocks to invest in. As per a news release on June 17 on the company’s website, it has received a five-year, $35 million award to support the Cross-Domain Enterprise Services program for the Defense Information Systems Agency (DISA). The company will oversee the […]
